title: Pumpkin and apple soup

default: 2 baking apples, peeled, cored and chopped
300ml/½ pint dry cider or apple juice

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and add the onions and the garlic. Cook for 2 minutes and then add the pumpkin, chopped apples and sage.
Cook for another 2 minutes, season well and add the stock and the cider or apple juice. Bring to the boil and simmer for 15-20 minutes until the ingredients are tender.
Liquidise and serve piping hot with crusty bread.
